activities: OmniTrace is a clinical trial support organization that provides the administrative function of updating current address information and vital status data of subjects identified as lost to follow up by clinical trial sites.  Data received from sites includes name, last known address, last known phone number and date of birth. No medical information is retreived.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Off-line and manually collected clinical trial subject data
recoursemech: EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs)and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)
